title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When attempting to add Javadoc to a field in TH, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not produce any result or take any action.
EB: When selecting 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu on a field in TH, it is expected that the action should add Javadoc to the field.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open TH. 2. Right-click on a field. 3. Select 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu.
